item.title: AZ-87 North at AZ-260
item.description: AZ-87 north at AZ-260 east in Payson.

item.title: AZ-87 North at AZ-260
item.description: AZ-87 north at AZ-260. Turn right for AZ-260 east for Show Low and Holbrook. Continue straight for AZ-260 west/AZ-87 north for Cottonwood (via AZ-260) and Winslow (via AZ-87). AZ-260 west joins AZ-87 north to the top of the Mogollon Rim.

item.title: AZ-87 North Approaching AZ-260
item.description: AZ-87 north approaching AZ-260. Use AZ-260 east for Holbrook and Show Low.

item.title: AZ-87 North Approaching AZ-260
item.description: AZ-87 north approaching AZ-260 at Milemarker 252.

item.title: AZ-188 Jct. Leaving Mazatzal Rest Area
item.description: AZ-188 junction leaving Mazatzal Rest Area. Turn right for AZ-188 South to Roosevelt. Turn left for AZ-188 North for AZ-87, Phoenix, and Payson.

item.title: AZ-87 North at AZ-188
item.description: AZ-87 north at AZ-188. Use AZ-188 for Roosevelt and Globe. Continue north on AZ-87 for Payson.

item.title: AZ-87 North - Exit 199
item.description: AZ-87 North at Exit 199 - Bush Highway. This is the only interchange along AZ-87 between Mesa and Payson, although the highway is divided for almost the entire stretch.

item.title: AZ-202 Loop East at AZ-87
item.description: AZ-202 Loop East, Exit 13 offramp, at AZ-87. Use AZ-87 north for Fountain Hills and Payson.

item.title: AZ-202 Loop East - Exit 13
item.description: AZ-202 Loop east at Exit 13 - AZ-87/Country Club Drive/Payson.

item.title: AZ-202 Loop East Approaching Exit 13
item.description: AZ-202 Loop East approaching Exit 13 - AZ-87/Country Club Drive/Payson.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 211B
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 211B - AZ-87 North/Coolidge.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 211A and Exit 211B
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 211A - Picacho. Approaching Exit 211B - AZ-87 North/Coolidge.
